text: Uye (vose) maJudha nemaKristu vanoti: “Isu tiri vana vaAllah uye ndisu vadiwa vavo.” Iti: “Sei (Allah) vachikurangarai nezvitadzo zvenyu?” Asi muri vanhu kubva muzvisikwa zvavakasika. Vanoregerera wavanoda uye vanoranga wavanoda. Uye Allah ndivo vane humambo hwematenga nepasi rino, uye nezviri pakati pawo. Uye kwavari ndiko kuchadzokerwa (nezvese)
